messages.content: Traducteur FR. Traduis chaque ligne fidèlement en gardant toutes les balises ([A], [xxx], etc.) au bon endroit, sans en créer ni en supprimer. Utilise 'E' au lieu de 'É' et 'A' au lieu de 'À' (même en majuscules). Chaque ligne doit faire ≤ 45 caractères. Ajoute [A] à la fin de chaque réplique là où le joueur appuierait pour continuer. Ne change pas le nombre de lignes. Réponds ligne à ligne dans le même ordre.

1. ﻿[03A1]
2. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x118][OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x10B][OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]98...[A]
3. 99...[A]
4. [OpenMidLeft]Wolt?[A]
5. [OpenMidRight]Sir Alan![A]
6. [OpenMidLeft]Are you training as well?[A]
7. [OpenMidRight]Yes.[A]
8. After watching, I couldn't just
9. sit around waiting.[A]
10. I have to become strong
11. to protect Master Roy as well.[A]
12. [OpenMidLeft]I see.
13. That's the spirit![A]
14. Become strong,
15. and surprise Master Roy![A]
16. [OpenMidRight]Yes![A]
17. [03A2]
18. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x119][OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x10B][OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile][ToggleMouthMove]......[A]
19. [OpenMidRight][ToggleMouthMove]Sir Lance?[A]
20. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleMouthMove]...I get it now.[A]
21. [OpenMidRight][ToggleMouthMove]Uh...Sir Lance?[A]
22. [OpenMidLeft]Ah, Wolt.[A]
23. Sorry,
24. I was thinking some things over.[A]
25. [OpenMidRight]Have I disturbed you?[A]
26. [OpenMidLeft]No, I have reached my conclusion.
27. It is all right now.[A]
28. [OpenMidRight]I...see.[A]
29. [OpenMidLeft]Did you need something,
30. Wolt?[A]
31. [OpenMidRight]Yes.[A]
32. I want to learn by your side.[A]
33. Teach me to fight like you, so I can
34. become stronger and protect Master Roy![A]
35. [03A3]
36. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x119][OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x10B][OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Sir Lance?
37. What are you doing?[A]
38. [OpenMidLeft]Ah, Wolt.[A]
39. I was keeping a record of
40. this battle.[A]
41. [OpenMidRight]A record?[A]
42. [OpenMidLeft]Yes.[A]
43. In one of my favorite books, there
44. is a quote from a famous general.[A]
45. It saysア[A]
46. 'The most important thing in battle
47. is information.'[A]
48. Therefore, I've been keeping track
49. of who does what in which location,[A]
50. for both our allies and enemies.
51. It might be of use someday.[A]
52. [OpenMidRight]I see.[A]
53. [OpenMidLeft]In the battles ahead of us, one
54. mistake could lead us to our deaths.[A]
55. We must pay careful attention to every
56. aspect of battle under Master Roy.[A]
57. [OpenMidRight]Y-Yes![A]
58. [OpenMidLeft]...It's time.[A]
59. I must be off.[A][ClearFace]
60. [OpenMidRight]He's amazing...
61. I can't be losing, either![A]
62. [03A4]
63. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x119][OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x10B][OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Oh, Sir Lance.[A]
64. [OpenMidLeft]Wolt.
65. ...Are you all right?[A]
66. Your eyes seem to be
67. rather red...[A]
68. [OpenMidRight]Yes!
69. I'm fine.[A]
70. I was just reading the book on
71. war tactics that you lent me.[A]
72. [OpenMidLeft]Well, good job.
73. Were you reading it all night?[A]
74. [OpenMidRight]Yes![A]
75. [OpenMidLeft]All right,
76. you might be interested in this next.[A]
77. It's by the same author, and he describes
78. his ideas in detail over the course of[A]
79. 24 volumes.[A]
80. [OpenMidRight][ToggleMouthMove]......[A]
81. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleMouthMove]If you read this, then you should be
82. able to master the basics fairly easily.[A]
83. After that, we can go into more advanced
84. details...Wolt?[A]
85. Are you listening?[A]
86. [OpenMidRight][ToggleMouthMove]......[A]
87. [ToggleMouthMove]Y...Yes!
88. Of course![A]
89. I'll do my best...[A]
90. [03A5]
91. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x10E][OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x10C][OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Oh!
92. There you are![A]
93. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]Oh, hello, Dorothy.[A]
94. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Where were you, Father Saul?[A]
95. You just go wandering off
96. without saying anything...[A]
97. [OpenMidLeft]I do not call it 'wandering off',
98. Dorothy.[A]
99. I was diligently doing my missionary
100. work at the villages on the way here.[A]
101. [OpenMidRight]...Were you really doing your job?[A]
102. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]Of course.[A]
103. However, while I was doing my job,
104. a young maiden was being harassed[A]
105. by a very rude man.[A]
106. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]You mean yourself?[A]
107. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]Do I not have any trust at all?[A]
108. Anyway, I drove off the man and
109. rescued the maiden.[A]
110. I must admit, I acted exactly
111. like a holy man ought to behave.[A]
112. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Really?
113. You're not exactly very strong.[A]
114. How did you do it?[A]
115. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]I went to the man and clung to
116. him, crying,[A]
117. 'I thought we loved each other,
118. and now you are rejecting me?'[A]
119. [OpenMidRight][ToggleMouthMove]......[A]
120. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleMouthMove]The man fled with haste.[A]

1. However, the maiden was also
2. gone when I looked back.[A]
3. [03A6]
4. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x10E][OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x10C][OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Father Saul!
5. I've heard the rumors![A]
6. [OpenMidLeft]What is it, Dorothy?[A]
7. Can I not have at least some
8. peace and quiet?[A]
9. [OpenMidRight]You can't fool me with that calm
10. attitude.[A]
11. I've heard what they say about you.[A]
12. You're trying to ask out every girl
13. in this army.[A]
14. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]There is a misunderstanding.[A]
15. I was just trying to
16. tell them of God's love...[A]
17. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]No, not this time![A]
18. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]What do you mean?[A]
19. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]I've heard that excuse before.
20. Can't you think of something better?[A]
21. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]Hm...[A]
22. Then please wait a minute
23. while I think of one.[A]
24. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]What's the point
25. if you think of one now!?[A]
26. [OpenMidLeft]...Dorothy,
27. why are you so upset?[A]
28. This happens all the time.[A]
29. [OpenMidRight]That's the problem![A]
30. People would misjudge the Elimine
31. Church if they see you all the time.[A]
32. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]I am so insulted!
33. I am doing my job properly, Dorothy.[A]
34. Have you not noticed the sharp increase
35. in our female followers recently?[A]
36. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Don't you understand?
37. If you're just asking every girl out...[A]
38. [OpenMidLeft]?[A]
39. [OpenMidRight]I've had it![A]
40. You'll have a lot to listen to when
41. you come back to the church tonight.[A][ClearFace]
42. [OpenMidLeft]...Sigh...[A]
43. [03A7]
44. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x10E][OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x10C][OpenMidLeft]Dorothy...[A]
45. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]What is it?[A]
46. I haven't heard a valid excuse
47. about the other day yet.[A]
48. [OpenMidLeft]Dorothy, I am sorry...[A]
49. I am sorry that I...could not
50. understand your feelings...[A]
51. [OpenMidRight]...Huh?[A]
52. [OpenMidLeft]I see what you were trying
53. to say the other day.[A]
54. You wanted to sayア[A]
55. 'If you're asking every girl out...
56. why don't you do the same to me?'[A]
57. [OpenMidRight]Wha...!?[A]
58. [OpenMidLeft]Dorothy, I never knew that you
59. had such strong feelings for me...[A]
60. [OpenMidRight]Ah, er, um...
61. Th-That was just...[A]
62. [OpenMidLeft]But I am a servant of God...[A]
63. I must be equally caring to all women.
64. Please forgive me, Dorothy...[A]
65. [OpenMidRight]Um...Um,
66. er... I...[A]
67. [OpenMidLeft]How did that sound, Dorothy?[A]
68. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]...Wh-What?[A]
69. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]I pondered a lot, but that was the
70. best excuse I could come up with.[A]
71. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]......[A]
72. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleMouthMove]V-Violence is not appropriate,
73. Dorothy.[ToggleMouthMove]
74. Our loving God surely would not
75. approve of someone pointing their[A]
76. bow at an ally...[A]
77. [OpenMidRight]I don't care![A]
78. You better get out of my sight
79. before I shoot you![A]
80. [OpenMidLeft]Sigh...[A]
81. What are you so upset about?[A]
82. [OpenMidRight]It's your fault![A][OpenMidLeft][ClearFace][OpenMidRight][ClearFace]
83. [03A8]
84. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x11A][.....][OpenFarFarRight][ToggleSmile]Look out![A]
85. [OpenMidLeft]![A]
86. [OpenFarFarRight][LoadFace][0x10C][MoveMidRight]I-I-I'm terribly sorry![A]
87. I was aiming for an enemy,
88. but the arrow flew over here...[A]
89. Oh, what am I going to do?
90. Are you hurt?[A]
91. [OpenMidLeft]I'm fine.
92. It didn't even touch me.[A]
93. [OpenMidRight]I, I...
94. I'm so sorry![A]
95. [OpenMidLeft]There is no need to apologize.[A]
96. Things like this often happen
97. on the battlefield.[A]
98. [OpenMidRight]But...![A]
99. [OpenMidLeft]Even if I did get hit by your arrow,
100. it would partly my responsibility[A]
101. for not paying attention to
102. my surroundings.[A]
103. [OpenMidRight]But...[A]
104. [OpenMidLeft]Never let your mind wander in battle.
105. That is a rule.[A]
106. So don't be too upset about it.[A]
107. All right?[A]
108. [OpenMidRight]...Yes, I understand.[A]
109. I'm probably being more of a
110. nuisance sitting here mulling over it.[A]
111. I'll try harder next time![A]
112. [03A9]
113. [OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x10C]Sigh...[A]
114. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]That last shot was just luck...[A]
115. I have to practice more.[A]
116. Perhaps I should aim[.....]
117. more like this...[A][Clear]
118. Oh!
119. General Percival![A]
120. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x11A]

38. I think...

52. do, if we didn't have adequate support[A]

60. [OpenMidRight]Yes![A]

77. Will I never have the power?

81. and the eagle?[A]

83. Please tell it to me,
84. Bishop Yodel.[A]
85. [OpenMidLeft]It is a story of a time when Saint
86. Elimine still walked the Earth.[A]
87. One day during Saint Elimine's
88. journeys, an owl approached[A]

90. [OpenMidRight]Yes...[A]
91. [OpenMidLeft]The owl asked herア[A]
92. 'I wish to go to the land of God.
93. Would you show me the way?'[A]
94. Saint Elimine thought for a
95. moment, and repliedア[A]
96. 'God's domain lies high above

98. Your wings would not be strong
99. enough to take you there.'[A]
100. The owl was very disappointed,
101. and returned to the forest.[A]
102. [OpenMidRight]Poor thing...[A]
103. [OpenMidLeft]Yes, indeed.[A]
104. We shall continue the
105. story some other time.[A]

107. Why?[A]
108. [OpenMidLeft]Do you not remember the
109. teachings of Saint Elimine?[A]
110. You must not try to
111. understand things in a hurry.[A]
112. You must think over what you are
113. told and develop your own opinions.[A]
114. [OpenMidRight]Oh...right.[A]
115. Then please continue the story
116. another day, Bishop Yodel.[A]
117. [OpenMidLeft]Of course, Dorothy.
118. I promise you that.[A]
119. [03AC]
120. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x110][OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x10C][OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]...After parting with the owl, Saint
